body.class: mediawiki ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Flag_of_Turkey_svg skin-vector

img.alt: File:Flag of Turkey.svg

div.p: Flag_of_Turkey.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,200 × 800 pixels, file size: 1 KB)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

a.title: Tүрік байрағы (Qazaqşa)(Türik Bayrağı) (page does not exist)

td.div: ភាសាខ្មែរ: ទង់ជាតិទួរគី

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

td.p: Turkish Flag Law (Türk Bayrağı Kanunu), Law nr. 2893 of 22 September 1983. Text (in Turkish) at the website of the Turkish Historical Society (Türk Tarih Kurumu)

td.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; font-weight: bold

img.alt: Turkish football.svg

table.style: width:100%;direction:ltr; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#FAF5E6; border:2px solid #E5D4A1;

img.alt: Picture of the day

tr.td:
This image was selected as a picture of the day for 18 December 2006(2006-12-18). It was captioned as follows:
English: Flag of Turkey.
Other languages
العربية: علم تركيا.
العربية: علم تركيا.
Česky: Turecká vlajka
Cymraeg: Baner Twrci.
Dansk: Tyrkiets flag.
Deutsch: Flagge der Türkei
English: Flag of Turkey.
Esperanto: Flago de Turkio
Español: La bandera de Turquía.
Français : Drapeau de la Turquie.
Galego: Bandeira de Turquía
Magyar: Törökország zászlaja
Italiano: Bandiera della Turchia.
日本語: トルコの国旗
한국어: 터키의 국기
Nederlands: De Turkse vlag.
Polski: Flaga Turcji.
Português: A bandeira da Turquia.
Română: Steagul republicii Turcia.
Русский: Флаг Турции
Slovenčina: Turecká vlajka
Svenska: Den turkiska flaggan.
Türkçe: Türkiye Bayrağı.
‪中文(简体)‬: 土耳其国旗

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 11:43, 25 September 2010

td.span: (The white border gets used on just flagstaff. And the crescent and the star have been one piece.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:50, 25 August 2010

td.span: (# Restored the white band at the left side (prescribed by the law). # Moved crescent over to the right by the width M (see the law) of that white band. # Moved star over slightly less so that the left point of the star has distance E (see the law) from th)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:48, 2 March 2010
Thumbnail for version as of 23:34, 2 November 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 10:39, 6 November 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 19:13, 24 March 2006. See talk page.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:38, 2 November 2008

td.span: (Reverted; please provide a better source than FOTW if you wish to change the colour or discuss at the talk page)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:51, 2 November 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 19:13, 24 March 2006 - Flag of Turkey isn't Maroon)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:15, 1 November 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 19:13, 24 March 2006

td.span: (Star is now exact. Based on an idea of User:Pumbaa80.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:06, 4 February 2006

td.span: (version without white heading, according to talk page. By me, PD)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 03:23, 28 January 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 22:30, 27 January 2006

td.span: (What's with the white strip at the left of the flag? Removed)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 23:59, 28 November 2005

td.span: (more accurate version: crescent is now exact, and star is accurate to 42 decimals)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:57, 1 October 2005
